questions.question_text: Which three statements are true about a job chain?

choices.A: It can contain a nested chain of jobs.
choices.B: It can be used to implement dependency-based scheduling.
choices.D: It cannot have more than one dependency.
choices.E: It can be executed using event-based or time-based schedules.
choices.C: It cannot invoke the same program or nested chain in multiple steps in the chain.

discussion.content: A job chain is a named series of tasks that are linked together for a combined objective.
